contest-event.event-date:
July 11, 1896 D Durham Contest
Durham Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
durham-contest
None
Wales
Wharton Park, Durham March contest: 1. Murton, 2. Hartlepool Temperance, 3. Gateshead
Prizes: £20, £12, £7, £5, £3
Hartlepool Operatic and Consett were disqualified for not taking part in the massed bands piece - having originally been awarded 2nd and 4th placings.
April 29, 2012, 8:31 p.m. Dec. 31, 2016, 4:03 p.m.
1 Murton Colliery Band Thomas Valentine
2 Hartlepool Temperance William Holdsworth
3 New Brancepeth James Ord Hume
4 St Paul's Gateshead James Ord Hume
Disqualified West Hartlepool Old Alexander Owen
Disqualified Consett Ironworks Unknown
